```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library("plotlyutils")
  library("plotly")
})

set.seed(42)

df <- lapply(1:26, function(x) rnorm(50)) %>% 
    as.data.frame()
colnames(df) <- letters
df[["seq"]] <- 1:50

df %>% plot_ly(x = ~seq, y = ~b, type = "scatter", mode = "lines")
```


```{r}
df %>% dropdown_lineplot(x="seq", yvars = letters)
```
